title: 13. The "No-Lose Lottery," Part 2
description: It’s the banking tool that got millions of people around the world to stop wasting money on the lottery. So why won't state and federal officials in the U.S. give it a chance?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: It’s the banking tool that got millions of people around the world to stop wasting money on the lottery. So why won't state and federal officials in the U.S. give it a chance?
